rules:
    servers-use-https:
            :
        description: Servers must use https to ensure the origin of the responses and protect the integrity and the confidentiality of the communication. You can use `http://` only on sandboxes environment. Use `x-sandbox: true` to skip this kind of check.
        message: Non-sandbox url {{value}} {{error}}. Add `x-sandbox: true` to skip this check on a specific server.
            :
            :
        severity: error
        recommended: true
            field: url
            function: pattern
            functionOptions:
            match: ^https://.*
